endpoint_access_rules._comment: Agents test through the SAME API surface that B2B consumers use. Admin endpoints are verification-only.

action_endpoints._comment: Agents MUST use these for all test actions (submit, approve, status, etc.). This is the B2B API surface.

verification_endpoints._comment: Agents may use these ONLY for auditing and state verification â€” never for test actions.

setup_only_endpoints._comment: Used ONLY in prerequisites (before agents run). Never during tests.

valid_files._comment: Files that MUST exist in bronze storage or wargames container. Sentinel should verify via discovery endpoints before launching.

raster.description: Small GeoTIFF for raster lifecycle testing (WGS84, single band)

vector.description: GeoPackage with nested folder path for vector lifecycle testing (WGS84)

raster_collection.description: Multi-file raster collection for tiled ingestion testing (WGS84)

geojson.description: Simple GeoJSON for vector format variant testing (WGS84, 3.7MB)

valid_files._comment_wargames: --- Files below are in the wargames container (same rmhazuregeo account â€” no file copying needed) ---

raster_utm.description: 8-band raster in UTM Zone 30N (EPSG:32630, 5.3MB) â€” tests CRS reprojection

raster_float32_utm.description: Float32 DEM in NAD83/UTM 18N (462MB, 10012x10012, nodata=-3.4e38) â€” tests float dtype + large raster

vector_geojson_small.description: Small GeoJSON with 483 LineString features (WGS84, 217KB, OSM roads)

vector_gpkg_utm.description: Roads GeoPackage in UTM Zone 16N (EPSG:32616, 228KB) â€” tests vector CRS reprojection

vector_geojson_webmercator.description: Roads GeoJSON in Web Mercator (EPSG:3857, 299KB) â€” tests non-geographic CRS

vector_kml.description: KML format (WGS84, 356KB) â€” tests KML ingest path

vector_shapefile_zip.description: Zipped shapefile (WGS84, 49KB) â€” tests archive extraction path

vector_geojson_large.description: Large GeoJSON (137MB) â€” tests chunking, pagination, memory under load

csv_geocoded.description: Geocoded CSV with lat/lon columns (2.8MB) â€” MUST include processing_options with lat_column/lon_column

netcdf_climate.description: NetCDF4 climate data (CMIP6 SPEI, 4MB, CF-1.7) â€” NOTE: .nc routes to VirtualiZarr pipeline, NOT raster

netcdf_climate_alt.description: Second NetCDF4 (SSP5-8.5 scenario) â€” routes to VirtualiZarr pipeline

invalid_files._comment: Deliberately bad inputs for Saboteur, Red, and Provocateur attacks. These SHOULD fail gracefully.
invalid_files._comment_identity: --- IDENTITY attacks: valid-looking params, missing/wrong resources ---

nonexistent_file.expected_error: File not found in bronze storage
nonexistent_file.attack_use: IDENTITY â€” submit with valid params but missing source file

nonexistent_container.attack_use: IDENTITY â€” valid file but wrong container

invalid_files._comment_payload_injection: --- PAYLOAD attacks: injection, traversal, boundary values ---

path_traversal.attack_use: PAYLOAD P10 â€” directory traversal attempt

sql_injection_dataset.attack_use: PAYLOAD P3 â€” SQL injection in identifiers

unicode_resource.attack_use: PAYLOAD P4 â€” unicode in identifiers

special_chars_dataset.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” path separator in identifier

null_values.attack_use: PAYLOAD P9 â€” null values in all fields

invalid_files._comment_corrupt_raster: --- CORRUPT RASTER attacks: files exist in wargames/bad-data/ ---

raster_no_crs.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” valid pixel data but no coordinate reference system

raster_no_geo.expected_error: No spatial reference â€” reject or warn
raster_no_geo.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” valid pixels but zeroed geotransform and no CRS

raster_truncated.expected_error: GDAL open failure â€” corrupt/incomplete file
raster_truncated.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” first 1KB of valid TIFF, rest missing

raster_empty.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” zero-byte file with .tif extension

raster_wrong_ext.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” GeoTIFF content with .png extension

raster_garbage.expected_error: GDAL open failure â€” not a valid raster
raster_garbage.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” 100KB random binary with .tif extension

raster_corrupt_header.expected_error: GDAL open failure â€” TIFF magic bytes but corrupt IFD
raster_corrupt_header.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” valid TIFF magic bytes (II*\0) followed by random garbage

invalid_files._comment_corrupt_vector: --- CORRUPT VECTOR attacks: files exist in wargames/bad-data/ ---

vector_truncated_json.expected_error: JSON parse error â€” truncated mid-stream
vector_truncated_json.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” first 500 bytes of valid GeoJSON, rest missing

vector_null_geometries.expected_error: Handle gracefully â€” skip null geometries or warn
vector_null_geometries.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” 2 features with geometry:null + 1 valid point

vector_empty_collection.expected_error: Empty dataset â€” reject or warn (no features to import)
vector_empty_collection.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” valid FeatureCollection JSON with zero features

vector_mixed_geometry_types.expected_error: Handle or reject â€” Point + LineString + Polygon in one collection
vector_mixed_geometry_types.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” mixed geometry types (may break single-type table assumption)

vector_html_disguised.expected_error: Not valid GeoJSON â€” content type mismatch
vector_html_disguised.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” HTML 404 page saved with .geojson extension

vector_empty_file.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” zero-byte file with .geojson extension

vector_huge_polygon.expected_error: Timeout, memory pressure, or graceful handling
vector_huge_polygon.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” single polygon with 100,000 vertices (2.4MB)

invalid_files._comment_corrupt_archive: --- CORRUPT ARCHIVE attacks: files exist in wargames/bad-data/ ---

shapefile_two_layers.expected_error: Ambiguous â€” two shapefiles in one zip, which to use?
shapefile_two_layers.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” zip containing lines.shp + points.shp (different geometry types)

shapefile_incomplete.expected_error: Missing sidecar files â€” .shp+.shx only, no .dbf or .prj
shapefile_incomplete.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” shapefile zip missing required .dbf and .prj components

shapefile_nested_zip.expected_error: Nested archive â€” zip inside a zip
shapefile_nested_zip.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” zip containing another zip (archive recursion)

gpkg_empty_table.expected_error: Empty spatial table â€” reject or warn (0 features)
gpkg_empty_table.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” valid GeoPackage schema but spatial table has zero rows

invalid_files._comment_corrupt_csv: --- CORRUPT CSV attacks: files exist in wargames/bad-data/ ---

csv_wrong_columns.expected_error: Column detection failure â€” no latitude/longitude or WKT column
csv_wrong_columns.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” CSV with x_coord/y_coord instead of latitude/longitude

csv_invalid_coords.expected_error: Coordinate validation â€” lat=999, lon=-999 out of range
csv_invalid_coords.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” CSV with latitude/longitude columns but impossible values

csv_header_only.expected_error: Empty dataset â€” header row only, zero data rows
csv_header_only.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” CSV with correct column names but no data

kml_empty.expected_error: Empty dataset â€” valid KML structure but no placemarks
kml_empty.attack_use: PAYLOAD â€” KML Document element with no Placemark children

approval_fixtures._comment: Pre-built approval payloads for testing approve/reject/revoke workflows.

missing_version_id._comment: No version_id â€” should fail validation

duplicate_version_id._comment: Use this AFTER v1 is already approved â€” tests conflict guard

_file_manifest._comment: Summary of test data locations â€” 01 MAR 2026
